item.title: Unlevel surface trip hazard, 29th September
item.description:
The footpath directly outside my house is damaged and in need of repair. There are large cracks in the tarmac and this is causing issues when my elderly mother visits as she has Parkinsons.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 29th September
item.description:
Customer reports that the drain/gulley is entirely blocked at the location. They request that it is cleared as they have concerns that their property will be flooded in heavy rain.
